com.coursefeedback.feedback

Interface FeedbackManager

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    BasicFeedbackManager

    public interface FeedbackManager
    Feedback Manager class Handles all feedback operations
    Author:
    Amine

        Adds feedback object to a course item identified by its id

      • getFeedbacksByCourseItemId

        java.util.Collection<Feedback> getFeedbacksByCourseItemId(int courseItemId)
        Get all feedbacks for a specific course item given its id
        Parameters:
        courseItemId - The id identifying the course item to get feedbacks from
        Returns:
        The collection of feedbacks the identified course item possesses
